record.title: ORDER OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that at 2:15 p.m. today, the Senate proceed to the consideration of calendar No. 82, S. Con. Res. 21, the concurrent budget resolution.
Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent to be permitted to speak for up to 10 minutes as in morning business.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
